content: @Pete Krautscheid We are collecting informant details for the state of New Hampshire. I could not locate informant fields on the VRDR IG. Can we use interested party for informant details or are there any plans to add informant section?

Hi @Sirisha Sathyamurthy @Pete Krautscheid

Informant information can be provided in Decedent(Patient).contact fields, although this is not clearly documented.
The only field component that maps to an IJE field is the relationship type (INFORMRELATE) from Decedent.contact.relationship.
